The two B-52 mechanics are already working in a restricted area, and have to possess a security level for that purpose.
Their security badge (1199) has the area's they are permitted access.
If they drove into another restricted area without an entry controller (Security Policemen at a gate shack or at least a check point)
Then the restricted area is the same level (priority B or C) then they can enter without a security violation.
Since there was no fenced/gated entry and no entry controller, it's safe to conclude the video wasn't accurately portrayed.
I know..That was my duties as a Security Policeman guarding priority resources, Reconnaissance aircraft (SR-71 and U-2 spy planes and RC-135 electronic spy planes)
But I do believe the account presented here as I've interviewed a number of Air Force Personnel who've observed similar craft at various Air Force installations.
And I myself have observed an unidentified aerial craft up close.
They're not from Groom Lake.
And they're not ours..

They leave so much out of this. It happened at more missile bases than just LoringAFB. My Dad was stationed at  MalmstromAFB in Montana and something came in there just like the 67 incident and shut em down. My Dad was staff sergeant who sent the guys out to check it out. The refused his order when they got there saying there is no way we are going in there. Some glowing "craft or Orb" glowing over the silos. This event is rarely mentioned but i seen them mention it one night on Larry King when he had those ufo guys on making claims about UFO and them monitoring our military. It started on the east coast and made stops along the way at our bases taking a looksie eventually  losing a track on it heading over whatever base if up there by Seattle..It has since been declassified and they mention my father in the release but only by his rank. He was told never to speak of it and he took that seriously. He always told me someday he would tell me about his experience in the Air Force with UFOs but waited until the declassification before he would tell me. This event im speaking of happened in October of 75 just month before i was born there in Montana. He got out shortly after.
